  • Constructor Details

    • PaintGun

      public PaintGun​(processing.core.PImage image, int x, int y, int width, int height, int capacity, int vel, int strokeLength)
      Parameters:
      x - The x coordinate of the starting position of the PaintGun.
      y - The y coordinate of the starting position of the PaintGun.
      width - The width of the paint gun.
      height - The height of the paint gun.
      capacity - the amount of ammunition this gun can hold
      rTime - the reload time of the gun
      vel - the muzzle velocity of bullets from this gun
      str - the size of "splotches" on the ground from this

  • Method Details

    • shoot

      public PaintBlock shoot​(java.awt.geom.Point2D click, java.awt.Color ownerColor)
      Returns a PaintBlock bullet with the correct velocities once the user has clicked to shoot.
      Parameters:
      point - The mouse-click point where the user clicked.
      Returns:
      A PaintBlock bullet.

    • shoot

      public PaintBlock shoot​(java.awt.geom.Point2D start, java.awt.geom.Point2D end, java.awt.Color playerColor)
      Shoots a PaintBlock from the bun
      Parameters:
      start - the begin location of the bullet (the gun)
      end - the desired point that the bullet must pas through
      playerColor - the color of the bullet
      Returns:
      the bullet that was shot
